bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology- Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM)) System Administration
Part 2: Software Administration
IEEE Standard for Information Technology- Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM)) System Administration - Part 2: Software Administration

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is part of the POSIX series of standards for applications and user interfaces to open systems. It defines a software packaging layout, a set of information maintained about software, and a set of utility programs to manipulate that software and information.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
